mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_APPROVAL (APP_CODE, DOC_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, APP_TITLE, APP_DESCRIPT, APP_DATE, APP_END_DATE, APP_OPEN) VALUES (null, #{ documentDto.docCode }, #{ memberDto.memberCode }, #{ appTitle }, #{ appDescript }, #{ appDate }, #{ appEndDate }, #{ appOpen } )
mapper.select: select ta.APP_TITLE , tal.APP_STATUS from TBL_APPROVAL ta join TBL_APPROVAL_LINE tal ON (ta.APP_CODE = tal.APP_CODE) where ta.APP_DATE >= date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
